messages.message: Hi @Josh Xie, @Hari et al were trying to use c-bindings approach to solving a very similar problem.  However, I think there is a fundamental issue if we have a 60MB file.  We need to really understand how we split the file into smaller managable solutions.
That's a great point too! We are also thinking to split .ibdoc too to have cleaner code / solutions. In that case I will pause the investigation? @Hari
Sure! We can discuss this in detail tomorrow
